conclusion: No violation of Art. 6-1 (right of access);Violation of Art. 6-1 (publicly);Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Costs and expenses award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF FISCHER v. AUSTRIA - [Russian Translation]
issue: Constitution, Articles 91, 130, 144 ; Administrative Court Act, sections 36, 39-42, 63
